DESCRIPTION: Ban a member from the server.
WEEk: You cannot ban a user for more than a week.
TOO_LOW: You cannot ban a user with either the same or higher highest role.
UNBANNABLE: In order to complete the request, I need the **BAN_MEMBERS** permission and my highest role needs to be higher than the requested user's highest role.
ERROR: An error occurred while trying to ban the requested user.
